extendedInfo.description: ââHomerun Battle Series at its PEAK!âââ20 Million Sluggers battling in 300 million match-ups!!âHit homeruns and become the hero of the arena!*** Over 10 MILLION players in more than 300 MILLION match-up games! *** The Best of the Best Apps Awards Winner *** Nominated as IMGA's Best GameAre you prepared to be the next batter up?Real-time Online Matchup Homerun Battle 3D!!Play ONLINE MATCHUP & go Head-to-Head against millions of Homerun Battle sluggers around the world.- 4 Extra Modes : Online Match up, Arcade, Training, and Classic- Over 100 Items : Uniforms, hats, equipment and other customizable features- Exclusive Baseball Wear : Includes the official DeMarini CF4, Voodoo and other M2M bat equipment. - This game supports English### Com2uS Hub Connection Notice ###- Your play data will automatically be saved in server when you login to Com2uS hub in Homerun Battle.- Enjoy a game of Homerun Battle in many different kinds of devices with the same ID, and save all data in your personal hub account.- GUEST PLAY allows you to play a game without a Com2uS hub account. Game data will automatically be transmitted to the server once you join or login to your hub account. reviews.title: Enjoyable
reviews.comment: I really like this game, but it takes to long to build up gold balls. I just wish it wss easier to get better equipment.
reviews.author: Prince Lawrence

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: Great game, graphics good, gameplay is good. Just wish there was a way to get more gold balls without purchasing. Thanks for a great game, few weeks and it could be legendary.
reviews.author: Ralph Linkenhoker

reviews.title: Freeze
reviews.comment: In game bat guide in strik e zone is frozen at this time. Hope its fixed soon. Really like this game. 4 stars until this is fixed. Samsung Galaxy Stellar
reviews.author: Troy Perdue

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: Love the game but wish all my items could have came with me on my new phone when I upgraded . I lost everything.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Move on
reviews.comment: They really ruined this app. Advertising even though this is the paid version. The forced login feature sucks. Jerks
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great game since the first evo.
reviews.comment: I just got an s3 the game is not loading up to fit the screen. But I know its a great game I make sure its reinstalled on everyphone I purchase. So 5 stars but update for my galaxy plz
reviews.author: Lamar Parker

reviews.title: Needs new equipment
reviews.comment: Lol to ralph with the razor comment this games around 5 years old could be more. In desperate need of some new better bats and uniforms now it\'s been ages and I got thousands of gold ball\'s with nothing to spend them on
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Messed u
reviews.comment: Can\'t even play a game wit out it going in n out can u please fix
reviews.author: Calvin seaburn

reviews.title: Absolutely love this game but...
reviews.comment: You need to realize some people are on data plans and have limits. I want to be able to play this game in arcade without it using the dang internet. Get rid of ur stupid adds and stop letting certain countries cheat!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Rip off
reviews.comment: Paid money played a ton. Now its saying I\'m loged in witch I am my stats and my name and everything I own is there and its showing me ADS AND WANTS ME TO PAY AGAIN ! HAPPEND TO MY Friends TOO. Plus is full of cheaters so u can only rank so high very disappointed.
reviews.author: Harry Mueller

reviews.title: Fix!!
reviews.comment: I just paid for the game and everytime I open it,it force closes its very frustrating please fix it,HELP!!
reviews.author: Nick Vazquez

reviews.comment: Not happy!!! Game cheats...dont buy until fixed. As a player you may have more HRs in a single game but still lose to your opponent. Does not make sense. They do not want you to come up in the ranks fairly...fckin cheats
reviews.author: sonny m.

reviews.title: Homerun battle 3D
reviews.comment: Someone say they can\'t play cause they are rooted... I\'m rooted and it plays perfect...Samsung galaxy s2 with jelly bean operating system
reviews.author: David Pickett

reviews.title: Hooked like a Wicked Tuna!!!
reviews.comment: With any game, it takes practice, patience but mostly...timing. I find it fun, easy to play and a great way to test how well my mind can focus. Awesome game......the hook hurts a little though...lol.
reviews.author: Marlin Knox

reviews.title: Excellent game
reviews.comment: One of my all time favorite games to play.

reviews.title: Bullsh*t Ads & Upgrade
reviews.comment: I paid for this App. I even spent MORE MONEY buying uniform upgrades for the game... However, you have the BALLS to still hit me with your F*CKING ADVERTISEMENTS!? After your forced upgrade, now it\'s non-stop ads on every menu page! F*ck You & this App, assh*les! I may not be able to get my refund but will TRASH this sh*t App on all social sites till you remove the ADS from PAID VERSION. Selling millions as you allege is not enough $$? U f*ck us more by your greed w/Ads!? EASILY FIXED, WE DUMP ON YOUR APP.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cool game
reviews.comment: Needs to have a faster way of collecting gold balls! Other than that it\'s pretty awesome!
reviews.author: george drake

reviews.title: Cheaters...
reviews.comment: I\'m seeing a lot of games where I clearly won, my ball landed before theirs, and they were significantly behind. Yet they receive the win. Something is off about this. I noticed it most when winning against highly ranked players. If you have to cheat, you\'re a loser.
reviews.author: Ferguson Mark

reviews.title: Great foul ball app
reviews.comment: Worst game with cheaters galore.  Good luck winning against these odds.
reviews.author: Jason R

reviews.comment: Awesome game. I don\'t even like baseball & this is one of my favorite apps/games.
